meanings.sent1: In the garden, the abelias bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some abelias in my backyard for their lovely flowers.
meanings.sent3: The abelias in the yard seemed to gossip with the roses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a cluster of abelias.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the abelias filled the air with sweetness.
